title: Multiboot Windows XP Install CD + Utilities 1.0
description:
Multiboot Windows XP Install CD + Utilities 1.0

This is my multiboot CD based on Ultimate Boot CD (http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/). 

Made by me from original MSDN version of Windows, no crap, neither activator or serial inside.
The CD includes:

Utilities:
:: Acronis Disk Director Suite 10
:: Acronis Drive Cleanser 6
:: Acronis True Image Home 2009
:: Paragon Disk Wiper 8.5 Professional
:: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 2008
:: Memtest86+ 2.10

OS:
:: Windows XP Home Retail with Service Pack 3
:: Windows XP Home Retail with Service Pack 3 (Unattended)
:: Windows XP Professional Retail with Service Pack 3
:: Windows XP Professional Retail with Service Pack 3 (Unattended)
:: Windows XP Professional VL with Service Pack 3
:: Windows XP Professional VL with Service Pack 3 (Unattended)

Screenshots:
- http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1503/ubcden1ht8.png (main)
- http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/2126/ubcden2na7.png (utilities)
- http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/2466/ubcden3sn6.png (os install)

Comments and suggestions appreciated!!!

EDIT: Iso name is wrong :)))) (It's "Ultimate" not "Universal")

NOTE 1: Running unattended setup requires you to input the following information:
- Registration name/organization
- Product key
- Regional settings

NOTE 2: You can also run this CD from an USB stick (but at lower speed) or modify menus and other stuffs. Refer to http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/ to get the scripts.

NOTE 3: Planned to integrate Vista and Windows XP Professional x64 also (remaining 
below 2GB). Waiting some downloads to make italian version!
